question: Is it ok to keep two names?
answer:
QUESTION
It is fashionable to keep two names, a first an second name. Is this ok?
ANSWER


Share:
Although it is permissible to do so, such was not the practice of Nabi
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) and his Sahaabah (Radhiallaahu Anhu), thus it
is not the ideal. Furthermore, it is noticed that people usually become
accustomed to one of the names, thereby neglecting the second.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Bilaal Cassim
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED CORRECT: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
